trans-unit.source: Provides properties, methods, and events related to the current application.
trans-unit.target: Inneholder egenskaper, metoder og hendelser som er relatert til dette programmet.

trans-unit.source: The properties exposed by the `My.Application` object return data that is associated only with the current application or DLL.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapene som vises i den `My.Application` objekt Returner data som er forbundet med den gjeldende applikasjons- eller DLL-filen.

trans-unit.source: No system-level information can be altered with `My.Application`.
trans-unit.target: Ingen systemnivå informasjon kan ikke endres med `My.Application`.

trans-unit.source: The `My.Application` object consists of the following classes: - ApplicationBase provides members that are available in all projects.
trans-unit.target: Den `My.Application` -objektet består av følgende klasser:-ApplicationBase inneholder medlemmer som er tilgjengelige i alle prosjekter.

trans-unit.source: - <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase> provides members that are available in Windows Forms applications.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase>gir medlemmer som ikke er tilgjengelig i Windows Forms-programmer.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.ConsoleApplicationBase> provides members that are available in console applications.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.ConsoleApplicationBase>gir medlemmer som er tilgjengelige i konsollen programmer.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.ConsoleApplicationBase>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.ApplicationBase"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.ApplicationBase"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Changes the culture used by the current thread for string manipulation and for string formatting.
trans-unit.target: Endrer kulturen som brukes av gjeldende tråd for streng redigeringen og strengformatering.

trans-unit.source: The `My.Application.ChangeCulture` method changes the current thread's <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Den `My.Application.ChangeCulture` metoden endrer gjeldende <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A> determines the default formats for dates, times, currency, numbers, sorting order of text, string comparisons, and casing for all computations on that thread.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A>Angir standardformater for datoer, klokkeslett, valuta, tall, sorteringsrekkefølge for tekst, strengsammenligninger og for alle beregninger i at tråden av små og.</xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A>

trans-unit.source: To retrieve the current culture, you can use the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.ApplicationBase.Culture%2A> property or the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: For å hente gjeldende kulturen, kan du bruke den <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.ApplicationBase.Culture%2A>egenskapen eller <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A> </xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.ApplicationBase.Culture%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A> setting is different from a language setting.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A>innstillingen er forskjellig fra en språkinnstilling.</xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A>

trans-unit.source: It contains only data related to the standard settings for a geographical region.
trans-unit.target: Den inneholder bare data som er relatert til standardinnstillingene for et geografisk område.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A> property can only be set to a specific culture or to the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Derfor <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A>egenskapen kan bare angis til en bestemt kultur eller <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture%2A>.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture%2A> </xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the `My.Application.ChangeUICulture` method to change the culture that the current thread uses for retrieving culture-specific resources.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av `My.Application.ChangeUICulture` metode for å endre kulturen som gjeldende tråd bruker for å hente kultur bestemte ressurser.

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > The `My.Application.ChangeCulture` method requires a <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermission> with the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag> set.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > Den `My.Application.ChangeCulture` metoden krever en <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermission>med den <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag>angitt.</xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermission>

trans-unit.source: Manipulating threads is dangerous because of the security state associated with threads.
trans-unit.target: Manipulering tråder er skadelige på grunn av sikkerheten som er forbundet med tråder.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, this permission should be given only as necessary to trustworthy code.
trans-unit.target: Denne tillatelsen må derfor angis bare nødvendige stole-koden.

trans-unit.source: You cannot change a thread's culture in semi-trusted code.
trans-unit.target: Du kan ikke endre en tråd kulturen i delvis klarert kode.

trans-unit.source: Availability by Project Type ||| |-|-| |Project type|Available| |Windows Forms Application|**Yes**| |Class Library|**Yes**| |Console Application|**Yes**| |Windows Forms Control Library|**Yes**| |Web Control Library|No| |Windows Service|**Yes**| |Web Site|No|
trans-unit.target: Tilgjengeligheten av prosjekttype ||| |-|-| | Prosjektet typen | Tilgjengelige | | Windows Forms-program | **Yes**| | Klasse biblioteket | **Yes**| | Konsollen programmet | **Yes**| | Windows Forms-kontroll biblioteket | **Yes**| | Web kontrollen biblioteket | Ikke | | Windows-tjenesten | **Yes**| | Webområdet | Ikke |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_String" name="String" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_String" name="String" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Name of the culture as a string.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på språket som en streng.

trans-unit.source: For a list of possible names, see <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil se en liste over mulige navn, se <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: cultureName is .
trans-unit.target: cultureNameis .

trans-unit.source: cultureName is not a valid culture name.
trans-unit.target: cultureNameer ikke et gyldig kulturnavn.

trans-unit.source: Changes the culture that the current thread uses for retrieving culture-specific resources.
trans-unit.target: Endrer kulturen som gjeldende tråd bruker for å hente kultur bestemte ressurser.

trans-unit.source: The `My.Application.ChangeUICulture` method changes the current thread's <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentUICulture%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Den `My.Application.ChangeUICulture` metoden endrer gjeldende <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentUICulture%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentUICulture%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentUICulture%2A> property determines the culture used by the Resource Manager and the `My.Resources` object; it uses this information to look up culture-specific resources at run time.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentUICulture%2A>egenskapen angir kulturen som brukes av ressursbehandling og `My.Resources` objekt; denne informasjonen brukes til å slå opp kultur bestemte ressurser på kjøretidspunktet.</xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentUICulture%2A>

trans-unit.source: To retrieve the current UI culture, you can use the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.ApplicationBase.UICulture%2A> property or the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentUICulture%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: For å hente gjeldende brukergrensesnittkultur, kan du bruke den <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.ApplicationBase.UICulture%2A>egenskapen eller <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentUICulture%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentUICulture%2A> </xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.ApplicationBase.UICulture%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the `My.Application.ChangeCulture` method to change the culture that the current thread uses for string manipulation and string formatting.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av `My.Application.ChangeCulture` metode for å endre kulturen som bruker gjeldende tråd for streng redigeringen og strengformatering.

trans-unit.source: Availability by Project Type ||| |-|-| |Project type|Available| |Windows Forms Application|**Yes**| |Class Library|**Yes**| |Console Application|**Yes**| |Windows Forms Control Library|**Yes**| |Web Control Library|No| |Windows Service|**Yes**| |Web Site|No|
trans-unit.target: Tilgjengeligheten av prosjekttype ||| |-|-| | Prosjektet typen | Tilgjengelige | | Windows Forms-program | **Yes**| | Klasse biblioteket | **Yes**| | Konsollen programmet | **Yes**| | Windows Forms-kontroll biblioteket | **Yes**| | Web kontrollen biblioteket | Ikke | | Windows-tjenesten | **Yes**| | Webområdet | Ikke |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_String" name="String" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_String" name="String" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Name of the culture as a string.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på språket som en streng.

trans-unit.source: For a list of possible names, see <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil se en liste over mulige navn, se <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: cultureName is .
trans-unit.target: cultureNameis .

trans-unit.source: cultureName is not a valid culture name.
trans-unit.target: cultureNameer ikke et gyldig kulturnavn.

trans-unit.source: Gets the culture that the current thread uses for string manipulation and string formatting.
trans-unit.target: Henter kulturen som bruker gjeldende tråd for streng redigeringen og strengformatering.

trans-unit.source: The `My.Application.CurrentCulture` property gets the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object that the current thread uses for string manipulation and string formatting.
trans-unit.target: Den `My.Application.CurrentCulture` egenskapen henter den <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>objekt som bruker gjeldende tråd for streng redigeringen og strengformatering.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: This object is identical to the one returned by the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A> property, which controls many of the string-related computations on that thread.
trans-unit.target: Dette objektet er identisk med den som ble returnert av den <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A>egenskap, som kontrollerer mange av streng-relaterte beregninger i at tråden.</xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A> property determines the default formats for dates, times, currency, and numbers.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A>egenskapen bestemmer standardformatene for datoer, klokkeslett, valuta og tall.</xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A>

trans-unit.source: It also determines how to sort, compare, and capitalize strings.
trans-unit.target: Den avgjør også hvordan du sorterer, sammenligne og stor bokstav strenger.

trans-unit.source: To change the culture, you can use the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.ApplicationBase.ChangeCulture%2A> method or assign a different <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object to the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil endre kulturen, kan du bruke den <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.ApplicationBase.ChangeCulture%2A>metoden eller tilordne en annen <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>objekt i <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A> </xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> </xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.ApplicationBase.ChangeCulture%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A> setting is different from a language setting.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A>innstillingen er forskjellig fra en språkinnstilling.</xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A>

trans-unit.source: It contains only data related to the standard settings for a geographical region.
trans-unit.target: Den inneholder bare data som er relatert til standardinnstillingene for et geografisk område.

trans-unit.source: Use the `My.Application.CurrentUICulture` property to get the culture that the current thread uses for retrieving culture-specific resources.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av `My.Application.CurrentUICulture` til å hente kulturen som gjeldende tråd bruker for å hente kultur bestemte ressurser.

trans-unit.source: Availability by Project Type ||| |-|-| |Project type|Available| |Windows Forms Application|**Yes**| |Class Library|**Yes**| |Console Application|**Yes**| |Windows Forms Control Library|**Yes**| |Web Control Library|No| |Windows Service|**Yes**| |Web Site|No|
trans-unit.target: Tilgjengeligheten av prosjekttype ||| |-|-| | Prosjektet typen | Tilgjengelige | | Windows Forms-program | **Yes**| | Klasse biblioteket | **Yes**| | Konsollen programmet | **Yes**| | Windows Forms-kontroll biblioteket | **Yes**| | Web kontrollen biblioteket | Ikke | | Windows-tjenesten | **Yes**| | Webområdet | Ikke |

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object that represents the culture the current thread uses for string manipulation and string formatting.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>objektet som representerer kulturen gjeldende tråd bruker for streng redigeringen og strengformatering.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: Returns the value of the specified environment variable.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer verdien for den angitte miljøvariabelen.

trans-unit.source: The `My.Application.GetEnvironmentVariable` method returns the environment variable with the name `name`.
trans-unit.target: Den `My.Application.GetEnvironmentVariable` metoden returnerer miljøvariabelen med navnet `name`.

trans-unit.source: This method is similar to <xref:System.Environment.GetEnvironmentVariable%28System.String%29?displayProperty=fullName>, except that this method raises an exception if the environment variable specified by `name` does not exist.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden er lik <xref:System.Environment.GetEnvironmentVariable%28System.String%29?displayProperty=fullName>, bortsett fra at denne metoden viser et unntak hvis miljøvariabelen angitt av `name` finnes ikke.</xref:System.Environment.GetEnvironmentVariable%28System.String%29?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Availability by Project Type ||| |-|-| |Project type|Available| |Windows Forms Application|**Yes**| |Class Library|**Yes**| |Console Application|**Yes**| |Windows Forms Control Library|**Yes**| |Web Control Library|No| |Windows Service|**Yes**| |Web Site|No|
trans-unit.target: Tilgjengeligheten av prosjekttype ||| |-|-| | Prosjektet typen | Tilgjengelige | | Windows Forms-program | **Yes**| | Klasse biblioteket | **Yes**| | Konsollen programmet | **Yes**| | Windows Forms-kontroll biblioteket | **Yes**| | Web kontrollen biblioteket | Ikke | | Windows-tjenesten | **Yes**| | Webområdet | Ikke |

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_String" name="String" href=""></xref> containing the name of the environment variable.
trans-unit.target: En <xref uid="langword_csharp_String" name="String" href=""> </xref> som inneholder navnet på miljøvariabelen.

trans-unit.source: A containing the value of the environment variable with the name name.
trans-unit.target: En som inneholder verdien for miljøvariabelen med navnet name .

trans-unit.source: name is .
trans-unit.target: nameis .

trans-unit.source: The environment variable specified by name does not exist.
trans-unit.target: Miljøvariabelen angitt av name finnes ikke.

trans-unit.source: The calling code does not have <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.EnvironmentPermission"></xref> with <xref uid="langword_csharp_Read" name="Read" href=""></xref> access.
trans-unit.target: Kall koden har ikke <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.EnvironmentPermission"> </xref> med <xref uid="langword_csharp_Read" name="Read" href=""> </xref> tilgang.

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that provides properties for getting information about the application's assembly, such as the version number, description, and so on.
trans-unit.target: Henter et objekt som inneholder egenskaper for å få informasjon om programmets samlingen, for eksempel versjonsnummeret, beskrivelse og så videre.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.AssemblyInfo"></xref> object for the current application.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.AssemblyInfo"> </xref> objekt for dette programmet.

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that provides properties and methods for writing event and exception information to the application's log listeners.
trans-unit.target: Henter et objekt som inneholder egenskaper og metoder for skriving hendelses-og unntak til programmets loggen lyttere.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.Log"></xref> object for the current application.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.Log"> </xref> objekt for dette programmet.

trans-unit.source: Gets the culture that the current thread uses for retrieving culture-specific resources.
trans-unit.target: Henter kulturen som bruker gjeldende tråd for henting av kulturen bestemte ressurser.

trans-unit.source: The `My.Application.CurrentUICulture` property gets the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object that the current thread uses for retrieving culture-specific resources.
trans-unit.target: Den `My.Application.CurrentUICulture` egenskapen henter den <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>objekt som bruker gjeldende tråd for å hente kultur bestemte ressurser.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: This object is identical to the one returned by the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentUICulture%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Dette objektet er identisk med den som ble returnert av den <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentUICulture%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentUICulture%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentUICulture%2A> property determines the culture used by the Resource Manager and the `My.Resources` object, information it needs to look up culture-specific resources at run time.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentUICulture%2A>egenskapen angir kulturen som brukes av ressursbehandling og `My.Resources` objektet, informasjon for å slå opp kultur bestemte ressurser på kjøretidspunktet.</xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentUICulture%2A>

trans-unit.source: To change the culture, you can use the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.ApplicationBase.ChangeUICulture%2A> method or assign a different <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object to the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentUICulture%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil endre kulturen, kan du bruke den <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.ApplicationBase.ChangeUICulture%2A>metoden eller tilordne en annen <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>objekt i <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentUICulture%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentUICulture%2A> </xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> </xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.ApplicationBase.ChangeUICulture%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A> setting is different from a language setting.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A>innstillingen er forskjellig fra en språkinnstilling.</xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A>

trans-unit.source: It contains only data related to the standard settings for a geographical region.
trans-unit.target: Den inneholder bare data som er relatert til standardinnstillingene for et geografisk område.

trans-unit.source: Use the `My.Application.CurrentCulture` property to get the culture that the current thread uses for string manipulation and string formatting.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av `My.Application.CurrentCulture` til å hente kulturen som bruker gjeldende tråd for streng redigeringen og strengformatering.

trans-unit.source: Availability by Project Type ||| |-|-| |Project type|Available| |Windows Forms Application|**Yes**| |Class Library|**Yes**| |Console Application|**Yes**| |Windows Forms Control Library|**Yes**| |Web Control Library|No| |Windows Service|**Yes**| |Web Site|No|
trans-unit.target: Tilgjengeligheten av prosjekttype ||| |-|-| | Prosjektet typen | Tilgjengelige | | Windows Forms-program | **Yes**| | Klasse biblioteket | **Yes**| | Konsollen programmet | **Yes**| | Windows Forms-kontroll biblioteket | **Yes**| | Web kontrollen biblioteket | Ikke | | Windows-tjenesten | **Yes**| | Webområdet | Ikke |

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object that represents the culture that the current thread uses for retrieving culture-specific resources.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>objektet som representerer kulturen som gjeldende tråd bruker for å hente kultur bestemte ressurser.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>
